subject: Chemistry
question_text: Given below are two statements: Statement - I: Along the period, the chemical reactivity of the element gradually increases from group 1 to group 18 . Statement - II: The nature of oxides formed by group 1 element is basic while that of group 17 elements is In the the light above statements, choose the most appropriate from the questions given below:

options.text: (1) Both statement I and Statement II are true.
(2) Statement I is true but Statement II is False.
(3) Statement I is false but Statement II is true.
(4) Both Statement I and Statement II is false.
